comments.body: Who needs the last four miles of Flag to make it super when you've got the company of frenz? Thanks for a beautiful Friday ride! Sorry the back wimped out. -AB

comments.body: Thanks, Sweetheart! We missed you too, but it was great to have such a large crew out on a Friday. Muchos gracias to iSean, Jason, and you!!
